documents.name: Cookies Policy
documents.text:
Help Center· Privacy &. Terms· Staff Support Cookies Policy This agreement was written in English (US).
Date of Last Revision: September 1, 2021

Please read the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy carefully. By accessing, browsing, using or registering with the similarworlds.com website, Similar Worlds or Similar Worlds Mobile, you represent and agree that (1) you are at least 13 years of age, (2) you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agree with the Terms of Service, the Privacy Policy and the Cookies Policy and (3) you will comply and be bound by the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy, including any future modifications.
If you do not agree to be bound by the Terms of Service or the Privacy Policy in their entirety or you are under 13 years of age, you are not authorized to use the similarworlds.com website, Similar Worlds or Similar Worlds Mobile. What are cookies, pixels, and local storage? Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computers hard drive through your web browser (if you allow that in its settings) that enables the sites or service providers systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information. A cookie contains limited non-personal data, usually a unique identifier, to enable a website to recognise you each time you visit the website again. Cookies are used for a wide variety of purposes such as to keep you logged in or to remember your preferences and settings, to analyse how the site is used by you and to serve advertising to you.

A pixel (also called clear GIF, web beacon, or pixel tag) is a small amount of HTML code on a web page or in an email notification. As many other services do, we use pixels to learn whether you've interacted with a certain email content. This helps us measure and improve our services and personalize your experience on Similar Worlds.

Local storage is an industry-standard technology that allows a website or application to store information locally on your computer. We use local storage to help personalize Similar Worlds. For example, synchronizing data between several open Similar Worlds tabs/windows on your web browser, making a history of latest Emoji you used, etc... Do we use cookies? Yes, just like many other websites.
We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners.
We use cookies to temporarily save your login information for your own convenience.
We also use cookies for other special features on Similar Worlds. Open Cookie options Why do we use cookies? Without cookies, it would be impossible for Similar Worlds to be secure and effective.
  • Authentication and Security
    Similar Worlds uses cookies to help authenticate you. This prevents unauthorized parties from accessing your account and helps us remember who you are, so you don't have to login every time you visit a page on Similar Worlds.
    Also, cookies protect your security on Similar Worlds, by making sure it is you and no one else using your account. Cookies are also used to fight spam.
  • Features and Preferences
    We use cookies to store your preferences on Similar Worlds, such as which language have you chosen or what popups have you hidden.
    Some features may also be driven by cookies.
  • Performance
    Cookies are also used for performance. There are some settings or data that we can temporarily store on your computer to make Similar Worlds pages load faster or even prevent some requests to us, because we know some data hasn't changed.
    Don't worry, we are very careful with your privacy, so we try our best to not store any personal data on cookies.
Do other parties use cookies in connection with Similar Worlds? Yes. Our partners may use cookies to provide services to us, for Analytics and Advertising purposes.
We use Google Analytics to help us understand how our users interact with our services, such as what pages are most visited and what links are not used. Please read the Google Analytics Cookie Usage Policy.
We use Google AdSense to provide advertising on Similar Worlds. Google AdSense uses cookies to provide high-quality ads that are more relevant and interesting to you. Please read Google Advertising Policy &. Terms.
We use Amazon Publisher Services to provide advertising on Similar Worlds. Amazon Publisher Services use cookies to provide high-quality ads that are more relevant and interesting to you. Please read Amazon - Privacy Notice.
Please read our Privacy Policy for more details about what information we share with our partners, and how you can opt-out. What is Do Not Track (DNT)? DNT is a concept that has been promoted by regulatory agencies such as the U.S. Federal Trade Commission (FTC), for the Internet industry to develop and implement a mechanism for allowing Internet users to control the tracking of their online activities across websites by using browser settings. However, there is no accepted standard for how a site should respond to this signal. As we need to use cookies for the purposes explained in this policy, and we do not intentionally track you when you use other websites, Similar Worlds does not respond to "do not track" signals. Disclaimer: Similar Worlds and all staff of Similar Worlds will not be held responsible for (1) any content generated by Similar Worlds users or (2) content that exists through any links posted on the Similar Worlds website.

Similar Worlds is in no way affiliated, endorsed, or sponsored by Experience Project.

Similar Worlds and all images associated with Similar Worlds are © Copyright 2022 Similar Worlds. All Rights Reserved.

documents.name: Terms of Service
documents.text:
Help Center· Privacy &. Terms· Staff Support Terms of Service This agreement was written in English (US).
Date of Last Revision: January 29, 2022

Please read the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy carefully. By accessing, browsing, using or registering with the similarworlds.com website, Similar Worlds or Similar Worlds Mobile, you represent and agree that (1) you are at least 13 years of age, (2) you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agree with the Terms of Service, the Privacy Policy and the Cookies Policy and (3) you will comply and be bound by the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy, including any future modifications.
If you do not agree to be bound by the Terms of Service or the Privacy Policy in their entirety or you are under 13 years of age, you are not authorized to use the similarworlds.com website, Similar Worlds or Similar Worlds Mobile. These Terms of Service governs our relationship with users and others who interact with Similar Worlds. By using or accessing Similar Worlds, you agree to this Statement. Privacy Your privacy is very important to us. We designed our Privacy Policy to make important disclosures about how you can use Similar Worlds to share with others and how we collect and can use your content and information. We encourage you to read the Privacy Policy, and to use it to help make informed decisions. Just like many other websites, use cookies. Sharing Your Content and Information You own all of the content and information you post on Similar Worlds. In addition:
  1. For content that is covered by intellectual property rights, like photos ("IP content"), you specifically give us the following permission, subject to your privacy and application settings: you grant us a non-exclusive, transferable, sub-licensable, royalty-free, worldwide license to use any IP content that you post on or in connection with Similar Worlds ("IP License"). This IP License ends when you delete your IP content or your account unless your content has been shared with others, and they have not deleted it.
  2. When you delete IP content, your removed content may persist in the database and backup copies for a reasonable period of time (but will not be available to others).
  3. When you publish content or information on a group, it means that everyone, including people off of Similar Worlds, will have access to that information and we may not have control over what they do with it.
  4. We always appreciate your feedback or other suggestions about Similar Worlds, but you understand that we may use them without any obligation to compensate you for them (just as you have no obligation to offer them).
Safety We do our best to keep Similar Worlds safe, but we cannot guarantee it. We need your help to do that, which includes the following commitments:
  1. You will not send or post unauthorized commercial communications (such as spam), post advertisements or solicitations of business on Similar Worlds.
  2. You will not collect users' content or information, or access Similar Worlds, using automated means (such as harvesting bots, robots, spiders or scrapers) without our permission.
  3. You will not engage in unlawful multi-level marketing, such as a pyramid scheme, on Similar Worlds.
  4. You will not upload viruses or other malicious code.
  5. You will not solicit login information or access an account belonging to someone else.
  6. You will not bully, intimidate or harass any user, directly or indirectly.
  7. You will not post content that is hateful, defamatory, discriminatory, threatening, pornographic or that contains graphic or gratuitous violence.
  8. You will not develop or operate a third party application containing or advertising or otherwise market alcohol-related or other mature content without appropriate age-based restrictions.
  9. You will not develop or operate a third party application that embeds the Similar Worlds website or that asks for the user login details.
  10. You will not offer any contest, giveaway or sweepstakes ("promotion") on Similar Worlds without our prior written consent. If we consent, you take full responsibility for the promotion and will follow all applicable laws.
  11. You will not use Similar Worlds to do anything unlawful, misleading, malicious or discriminatory.
  12. You will not distribute private or personal information, photos, videos or other material of another person without their express consent for you to do so.
  13. You will not do anything that could disable, overburden or impair the proper working of Similar Worlds, such as a denial of service attack.
  14. You will not facilitate or encourage any violations of this Statement.
  15. You will not post any content that promotes, sexualizes or encourages behaviors that are seen as illegal or criminal by general/majority international consensus (such as Pedophilia, Bestially, Sexual Abuse, Incest, etc...), or any images or videos that contain such behaviors.
  16. You will not post any content which relates to, describes, or depicts, any form of violence or physical/embarrassing punishment towards minors. The only exception is with regards to legitimate personal experiences that has happened to the poster before adulthood (such as personal experiences of past trauma, which they may wish to share for support or education), as long as that content is not sexualized or fetishized.
Please note:
  1. We reserve the right to restrict contact between members as a protection measure, if there have been complaints or if our system's algorithms prevent that contact.
  2. We provide a list of Suicide Crisis Help Lines, for a number of countries, that might be helpful for those in need.
Acceptable Behavior &. Protecting Other People's Rights We respect other people's rights and expect you to do the same.
  1. You agree to follow our Acceptable Behavior guidelines.
  2. You will not post content or take any action on Similar Worlds that infringes or violates someone else's rights or otherwise violates the law.
  3. You will not submit or upload material that is copyrighted, protected by trade secret or otherwise subject to third-party proprietary rights, including privacy and publicity rights, unless you are the owner of such rights or have permission from their rightful owner to post the material and to grant Similar Worlds all of the license rights granted herein.
  4. You will not publish falsehoods or misrepresentations that could damage Similar Worlds or any third party.
  5. We can remove any content or information you post on Similar Worlds if we believe that it violates this Statement.
  6. If we remove your content for infringing someone else's copyright and you believe we removed it by mistake, we will provide you with an opportunity to appeal.
  7. If you repeatedly infringe other people's intellectual property rights, we will disable your account when appropriate.
  8. You will not use our copyrights or trademarks or any confusingly similar marks, without our written permission.
  9. If you collect information from users, you will: obtain their consent, make it clear you (and not Similar Worlds) are the one collecting their information, and post a privacy policy explaining what information you collect and how you will use it.
  10. You will not post anyone's identification documents or sensitive financial information on Similar Worlds.
  11. You will not share anyone's private message(s) or private post(s) (including screen capture, plain text, or any other form), without that user's consent, or without fully removing or censoring every personally identifiable information, such as username, profile picture and any other contents that may identify the user in any way or break that user's privacy.
  12. You will not mention other users by their username, profile picture and other contents that identify the user, in a way that harasses or insults them, and you will remove the post if requested by the mentioned user.
  13. You will not send email invitations to non-users without their consent.
  14. You will not post the same or very similar posts/replies repeatedly, even if you post them to different groups. By doing so, you are duplicating contents, attracting more attention to your posts unfairly and annoying other users.
  15. You will not abuse, misuse or manipulate Reaction and Downvote features, whether manually, programmatically or otherwise. This includes using multiple accounts to react/downvote, or asking people to react/downvote, or forming or joining a group that reacts/downvotes together.
  16. You will not abuse, misuse or manipulate the submission of abuse reports, whether manually, programmatically or otherwise. This includes using multiple accounts to report, or asking people to report, or forming or joining a group that reports together.
Registration and Account Security Similar Worlds users can have either an Anonymous/Fictional or Real profile. Here are some commitments you make to us relating to registering and maintaining the security of your account:
  1. You will not create multiple accounts on Similar Worlds in a way that can be seen as abusive usage. The average user has only one account, but it is acceptable for someone to own up to three accounts as long as your accounts are following our terms of service and not causing conflicts with other users. Canceling old accounts does not make it acceptable to create new accounts to stay on this limit.
  2. You will not create additional accounts in order to be able to contact users who blocked you on your previous accounts.
  3. You will not use any of your additional accounts to contact users who blocked you on any of your other accounts.
  4. You will not create an account for anyone other than yourself without permission.
  5. You will not impersonate another person.
  6. You will not use your personal profile for your own commercial gain (such as selling a shared message, comment, message or post to an advertiser, or asking users for money).
  7. You will not use Similar Worlds if you are under 13.
  8. You will not use Similar Worlds if you are a convicted sex offender.
  9. You will keep your contact information accurate and up-to-date.
  10. You will not share your password, let anyone else access your account or do anything else that might jeopardize the security of your account.
  11. You will not transfer your account to anyone.
  12. You will not submit a fake, modified or incomplete photo to our verification system. If you want to be verified, you can upload your own photos, unmodified.
  13. If you select a username for your account, we reserve the right to remove or reclaim it for any reason (such as when a trademark owner complains about a username that does not closely relate to a user's actual name. or if the username is inappropriate).
  14. You may cancel your account at any time by accessing your Account Settings, then Leave Similar Worlds and following the instructions there. After your account has been set to hiatus, you can complete the process to cancel your account. Once canceled, it can no longer be reactivated.
Anonymous or Fictional Profiles A profile is considered Anonymous or Fictional if its name, profile photo and personal information do not belong to the owner of the account. The profile must not impersonate another person. If the fictional profile contains photos belonging to another person, any descriptions in the photos and in the profile must be explicit that the person in the photos is not the owner of the account. The owner of the account must not post another person's photos unless they have the consent and authorization of the person in those photos. Content Rating Levels You must ensure that your posts are tagged properly.
Similar Worlds is a very diverse social network, of varying opinions, ideologies and standards.
In order to help protect users and provide the most relevant and appropriate content per each user's preferences, it is important that all users act responsibly, correctly labeling/categorizing their own content, especially when it falls into more adult themed categories.
Users can select through their account settings, various "Content Rating Levels", which algorithmically determines what content may be most suitable and interesting for that user.
Below is a description of each rating level:
  • Family Safe - This category is for content that is considered to be completely safe, free of any Adult/Mature, Inappropriate, Abusive, Offensive or Sensitive content.
    This is typically content that is safe for viewing in the presence of family, co-workers, public audiences or in any other setting.
    Similar Worlds makes an extra effort to thoroughly screen (algorithmically) content entering this category, so that it is likely safe for even the youngest users of our website.
  • Non-Adult - This category is for content that is considered to be safe, free of Adult/Mature, Inappropriate, Abusive, Offensive or Sensitive content.
    This is typically content that is safe for viewing in most settings. Content falling in this category must not be obviously Mature or Inappropriate in nature.
    As Similar Worlds allows for freedom of speech, opinion and expression, we attempt to strike some balance as to not over-aggressively filter everything appearing in this category.
  • Mildly Adult - This category is for content which may be of "Mildly Adult" nature.
    This includes very slightly/mildly Adult/Mature, very slightly/mildly Inappropriate, very slightly/mildly Offensive or very slightly/mildly Sensitive content.
    Example: Mildly Adult Language, Jokes, References, Imagery.
    Content within this category may be considered as "PG 13" by today's standards, but not at/above "18+" / "R" rating.
  • Adult - This category is for content which may be of "Adult" nature.
    This includes Adult/Mature, Inappropriate, Offensive or Sensitive content.
    Example: Adult Language, Jokes, References, Imagery (not including nudity).
    Content within this category is not suitable for minors.
    Please note that we do not allow the posting of Nudity, Extremely Offensive or Abusive content, within areas of SW that are labelled as "Adult".
Although we allow freedom of speech, opinion and expression, users are not permitted to bully, abuse, harass or offend other members. You can also select the options below:
  • Nudity - This category is for content which may contain imagery of mild "Nudity".
    This includes any image, video or other media content which displays or depicts mild Nudity.
    Please note that we do not allow images that are focused or zoomed in to genital areas, or where sexually explicit acts are involved.
  • Fetish - This category is for content which may be considered to be a "Fetish".
    While the definition and categorization of "Fetish" is very broad, users are expected to use their discretion, while also keeping in line with the other Terms of Service of Similar Worlds.
    Please note that this category is NOT allowed the posting of highly Explicit, highly Violent or highly Revolting content.
  • Sensitive - This category is for content which may be of "Sensitive" nature.
    This includes content that may be visually or mentally disturbing to viewers.
    Example: Content that is Mildly Gruesome, Revolting or Violent.
    Please note that this category is NOT allowed the posting of Strong Violence, Strong Gore or Strong Revolting content.
Monitoring and Reports Similar Worlds has the right, but not the obligation, to monitor any and all activity on Similar Worlds. Similar Worlds also has the right, but not the obligation, to investigate the reports of improper conduct. Similar Worlds may remove any user submission or terminate any user account or ban any user at any time for any action in violation of the Terms of Service including, for conduct detrimental to other users or Similar Worlds, or for any other reason that in Similar Worlds' sole discretion warrants such termination.
You will not submit false or inaccurate reports against members, posts or groups. Please only submit a report in cases of actual abusive, spam, suicide or illegal activity. VIP Membership, Payment &. Renewal Terms of Service
  1. You can upgrade your account to VIP by paying or subscribing to one of the packages available. If you already have an active VIP subscription and purchase VIP again, the new VIP time you purchase will be added/accumulated onto your existing VIP time.
  2. You may choose to purchase a VIP subscription for another user, by choosing that user at the time of purchase. If the recipient already has an active VIP subscription, the new VIP time you purchase will be added/accumulated onto their existing VIP time.
  3. If you choose to become a VIP on Similar Worlds, your membership subscription may be automatically renewed based on the frequency you choose, until canceled by you. After your initial subscription commitment period, your subscription may be automatically renewed for additional equivalent periods, at the purchase price of your initial subscription.
  4. Once you have paid for any premium services on Similar Worlds, they are non-refundable.
  5. If, at any point, you wish to discontinue your VIP membership, and you have an active auto-renewable subscription, you must visit the VIP Settings page and select 'Cancel VIP Membership' before the next scheduled automatic payment. We do not issue partial/pro-rated refunds for early cancelation of any subscriptions.
  6. We do not have access to your Credit Card information through our sales. The payments are processed by a trusted 3rd-party payment processor, PayPal. By subscribing, you confirm you are at least 18 years of age and you authorize PayPal to charge your Credit Card now and again at the beginning of any subscription period, up until one year since the first payment. In the event that your credit card is ever denied, we reserve the right to cancel your subscription and you may have to re-subscribe in order to continue your VIP Membership.
  7. You can also contact us by sending an email to payments@similarworlds.com with your question and we will get back to you as soon as we can.
Transferring VIP from an account to another is possible, by requesting this via an email or ticket to us, only in the following conditions:
  • You intended to gift the VIP to someone else, but you forgot to choose the recipient at the time of purchasing, and you contacted us within a few hours after purchasing. or
  • You want to transfer the remaining VIP time to another account of yours because you used the wrong account to purchase, and you contacted us within a few hours after purchasing.
  • Due to the variance between pricing rates, you cannot split a VIP purchase in smaller subscriptions, to be distributed between multiple accounts. If we transfer VIP membership between accounts, we will transfer the purchased package in full, to the target account, without possibility of splitting.
Disputes If anyone brings a claim against us related to your actions, content or information on Similar Worlds, you will indemnify and hold us harmless from and against all damages, losses, and expenses of any kind (including reasonable legal fees and costs) related to such claim. Modification of these Terms Similar Worlds reserves the right, at our discretion, to change, modify, add, or remove portions of these Terms of Service at any time. Similar Worlds reserves the right to modify or discontinue the website without notice to you. Please check the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of Similar Worlds after the posting of changes constitutes your binding acceptance of such changes. If the modified Terms of Service are not acceptable to you, then your only recourse is to discontinue using the Site. Complaints If you are dissatisfied with this website or any aspect of it, you may email us at support@similarworlds.com.

Disclaimer: Similar Worlds and all staff of Similar Worlds will not be held responsible for (1) any content generated by Similar Worlds users or (2) content that exists through any links posted on the Similar Worlds website.

Similar Worlds is in no way affiliated, endorsed, or sponsored by Experience Project.

Similar Worlds and all images associated with Similar Worlds are © Copyright 2022 Similar Worlds. All Rights Reserved.

documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Help Center· Privacy &. Terms· Staff Support Privacy Policy This agreement was written in English (US).
Date of Last Revision: February 5, 2022

Please read the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy carefully. By accessing, browsing, using or registering with the similarworlds.com website, Similar Worlds or Similar Worlds Mobile, you represent and agree that (1) you are at least 13 years of age, (2) you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agree with the Terms of Service, the Privacy Policy and the Cookies Policy and (3) you will comply and be bound by the Terms of Service and the Privacy Policy, including any future modifications.
If you do not agree to be bound by the Terms of Service or the Privacy Policy in their entirety or you are under 13 years of age, you are not authorized to use the similarworlds.com website, Similar Worlds or Similar Worlds Mobile. What information do we collect? We collect information from you when you fill out a form, use our services or when you log into Similar Worlds.

  1. At the time you sign up for an account, we collect basic details you provide to us, such as your name, e-mail address, sex and birth date.
  2. When you log in, create a post, write a comment or use our services, we may save some details, such as your IP and device you are using.
  3. When you upload a photo, we may save some meta data that comes with the image.
  4. If you choose to submit private photo(s) for account verification, we save those image(s) in our servers. You can delete these verification photos as any time.
  5. When you make a payment, we may save some transaction details such as the item you purchased, your payment amount and PayPal public details. We do not have access to your credit card information and we do not save any details of it.
  6. We may collect information about your device and browser, such as what modern web technologies your browser supports, whether you use an ad-blocker, your operating system, your browser name and some other details. We do not have access to your computer username, password or personal files.
What do we use your information for? Any of the information we collect from you may be used in one or more of the following ways:

  1. To personalize your experience
    Your information helps us to better respond to your individual needs, ensure we provide you with website features that your browser supports, and provide you support when you need help from us.
  2. To improve our website
    We continually strive to improve our website offerings based on the information and feedback we receive from you. These details also help us in knowing our community better and ensure that we take the right decisions when we make changes or implement something new.
  3. To improve customer service
    Your information helps us to more effectively respond to your customer service requests and support needs. We also use your information to respond to you when you contact us.
  4. To process transactions
    Your payment information, whether public or private, will not be sold, exchanged, transferred, or given to any other company or entity for any reason whatsoever, without your consent, other than for the express purpose of delivering the purchased product or service requested.
  5. To protect our community
    We use the information we have to help verify accounts and activity, and to promote safety and security on and off of our services, such as by investigating suspicious activity, abuse or violations of our terms or policies.
How do we protect your information? We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you access your personal information:

  1. We store your passwords using an encryption algorithm specifically designed for this purpose. We have no way of knowing what your password is, using the data we store in our database.
  2. We are constantly checking that our applications and servers are secure, doing our best to prevent unwanted individuals from taking control of our systems or gaining access to private data.
  3. We encrypt our server backups and database backups as a way of better protecting your data.
  4. We use HTTPS/SSL (secure connection) on Similar Worlds, which means that your activity is encrypted and private.
  5. We don't use insecure protocols to administrate our server, database or emails. We also try our best to disable the usage of insecure protocols.
  6. We don't share your personal information without your permission (unless required by law).
  7. We restrict access to personal information only to the Admins of Similar Worlds. Moderators and Staff (other than the Admins) may have access only to the information that they need to know in order to process it for us (such as dealing with Reports of public posts and replies). Only Admins and selected Moderators have access to Posts which visibility is set to 'Friends-only' while the user hasn't added the Admin or Moderator as a friend. Moderators and Staff (other than the Admins) do not have access to your private messages. Moderators and Staff are subject to strict confidentiality obligations and their role may be terminated if they fail to meet these obligations.
  8. We limit the data we keep in places outside the main databases, such as logs, documents, notes, emails and conversations. If any of these require any personal identifiable information, we only add the data we need for each specific scenario, and we destroy that data when we don't need it anymore. This helps greatly in preventing against data breaches.
Do we use cookies? Yes, just like many other websites. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your device's hard drive through your web browser (if you allow that in its settings) that enables the sites or service providers systems to recognize your browser and capture and remember certain information.
We use cookies to personalize content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyze our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners.
We use cookies to temporarily save your login information for your own convenience.
We also use cookies for other special features on Similar Worlds.
Please read more in our Cookie Policy. Do we disclose any private information to outside parties? We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your private personally identifiable information. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you, so long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also release your information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect ours or others' rights, property, or safety. Non-personally identifiable visitor information may be provided to other parties for marketing, advertising, or other uses. Information shared with partners
  1. We only share the minimum required information with our partners. We do not intentionally share any personal identifiable information with our partners. This means that the data we share with our partners isn't enough to identify our users.
  2. We don't intentionally share private data (such as your email, username, user ID or private messages) with partners, unless the data is available to public on your profile, or it is essencial to provide a service.
  3. We don't intentionally share sensitive data (such as your sexual orientation or religious beliefs) with partners, unless the data is available to public on your profile.
  4. We use Amazon Web Services (AWS) to send email notifications and other correspondence, via email, to our users.
  5. We use Google Analytics to help us understand how our users interact with our services, such as what pages are most visited and what links are not used. With Google Analytics, we gather stats of the URLs/links our users visit and some of the buttons or links being pressed, without linking any of these stats or events to our users individually. This data doesn't include your name, messages or other personal content. Users may opt out of Google Analytics by visiting the Google Analytics Opt-out Page. Users may access and/or delete activity stored by Google via Google's My Activity Page.
  6. We use Google AdSense to provide advertising on Similar Worlds. Google AdSense uses cookies to provide high-quality ads that are more relevant and interesting to you. Google AdSense only has access to pages that can be publicly seen by members of Similar Worlds. For example, if a post can be seen by a common Similar Worlds member, then Google AdSense will be able to view it. however, Google AdSense cannot view any of your private messages. Users may opt out of Google's use of cookies by visiting the Google AdSense Opt-out of Ad personalization.
  7. We use Amazon Publisher Services to provide advertising on Similar Worlds. Amazon Publisher Services use cookies to provide high-quality ads that are more relevant and interesting to you. Amazon Publiser Services only has access to pages that can be publicly seen by members of Similar Worlds. For example, if a post can be seen by a common Similar Worlds member, then Amazon Publisher Services will be able to view it. however, Amazon Publisher Services cannot view any of your private messages.
Please read the Privacy Policy of our partners and find ways to opt-out, below:
Google - How Google uses information from sites or apps that use our services
Google Analytics - Opt-out
Google - My Activity
Google AdSense - Opt-out of Ad personalization
See our list of Ad technology providers
Amazon Web Services - Privacy Notice
Amazon Web Services - Data Privacy
Amazon - Privacy Notice
Amazon - Opt-out of Ad personalization
How do we retain and access information? We may retain information from accounts disabled for violations of our terms for at least a year to prevent repeat abuse or other violations of our terms. When you delete your contents, your removed content may persist in the database and backup copies for a reasonable period of time (but will not be available to others). We may also access, preserve and share information when we have a good faith belief it is necessary to: detect, prevent and address fraud and other illegal activity. to protect ourselves, you and others, including as part of investigations. or to prevent death or imminent bodily harm. Your account settings and email notifications When you register on Similar Worlds, you are automatically subscribed to the email notifications of its basic features.
However, you may disable some or all notifications via your Account Settings - Email Preferences.
On that page, you can edit your account preferences. If you no longer wish to use or have access to that particular account on Similar Worlds, you may cancel your account at any time by accessing your Account Settings, then Leave Similar Worlds and following the instructions there. After your account has been set to hiatus, you can complete the process to cancel your account. Once canceled, it can no longer be reactivated. Profile Visibility Profiles on Similar Worlds are set, by default, to be visible by everyone, including people who are not registered on Similar Worlds.
This setting can be changed through your Account Settings. You can set your profile visibility to Members only.
If your profile visibility is set to Public, everyone will be able to see your public comments, stories, groups, public photos and other contents that are not private.
If you set a photo or image as your Profile Picture, both the thumbnail (small) version of the photo and the full (big) version of the photo will be made public, independently of the privacy setting of the album that the image is in. Sharing Posts on Similar Worlds When you share a post (via the submission form at the top of any group or community, or the Post page), your submission will be posted to the group or community and will be made public. Sharing Photos on Similar Worlds The visibility of the photos you upload to your profile depends on the Album you post into. If an Album's visibility is set to Friends, its photos will only be visible to users on your Friends List. This also means that updates about that image (upload or comments) will not appear in the news feed of users who are not on your Friends List.
Always think before you upload a image. If someone provides the direct link of the image (URL) to a person that is not on your Friends List, that person will be able to see the image. The page on your album that contains the image will not be accessible to non-Friends (depending on your privacy setting) and the image will not appear in the Albums list.
If the album visibility is set to Everyone, this setting will change its behavior depending on your profile visibility. This means that if your profile visibility is set to Friends, then the photos in the album will be visible to users on your Friends List only.
If you set a photo or image as your Profile Picture, both the thumbnail (small) version of the photo and the full (big) version of the photo will be made public, independently of the privacy setting of the album that the image is in. Third party links Occasionally, at our discretion, we may include or offer third party products or services on our website. These third party sites have separate and independent privacy policies. We therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these linked sites. Nonetheless, we seek to protect the integrity of our site and welcome any feedback regarding these sites. Children We do not intentionally gather personal information of users and visitors who are under the age of 13. Terms and Conditions Please also visit our Terms and Conditions section establishing the use, disclaimers, and limitations of liability governing the use of our website. Your Consent By using our site, you consent to our privacy policy. Changes to our Privacy Policy We reserve the right to revise our policies at any time without notice.
If we decide to change our privacy policy, we will post those changes on this page. Contacting Us If there are any questions regarding this privacy policy, you may email us to support@similarworlds.com.

Disclaimer: Similar Worlds and all staff of Similar Worlds will not be held responsible for (1) any content generated by Similar Worlds users or (2) content that exists through any links posted on the Similar Worlds website.

Similar Worlds is in no way affiliated, endorsed, or sponsored by Experience Project.

Similar Worlds and all images associated with Similar Worlds are © Copyright 2022 Similar Worlds. All Rights Reserved.

points.title: Usernames can be rejected or changed for any reason
points.quoteText: • If you select a username for your account, we reserve the right to remove or reclaim it for any reason (such as when a trademark owner complains about a username that does not closely relate to a user's actual name. or if the username is inappropriate).

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.quoteText: You may cancel your account at any time by accessing your Account Settings, then Leave Similar Worlds and following the instructions there. After your account has been set to hiatus, you can complete the process to cancel your account. Once canceled, it can no longer be reactivated.

points.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they may use that without your approval or compensation, but they do not become the owner
points.quoteText: We always appreciate your feedback or other suggestions about Similar Worlds, but you understand that we may use them without any obligation to compensate you for them (just as you have no obligation to offer them).

points.title: You maintain ownership of your content
points.quoteText: You own all of the content and information you post on Similar Worlds.
